title.narrative: UG-2072 OKP Industrial Training West-Nile Uganda

description.narrative: Improving Industrial training for increased food and nutrition security for Refugees and Host communities in West-Nile, Uganda. 7 training components (2 for DIT, 5 for VST's). Consortium with War Child Holland and Norwegian Refugee Council.

transaction.ref: UG-2072 overboeking zie mail Bart 020321 nr #19500
UG-2072 OKP Industrial Training West-Nile Uganda: € 12.932,00 (29-12-20)
UG-2072 OKP Industrial Training West-Nile Uganda: € 151,25 (29-4-21)

title.narrative: Education providers deliver relevant and quality (vocational) education

title.narrative: Number of schools that deliver relevant and quality education

description.narrative: Education providers are supported in taking a responsibility in quality and relevance ensurance of their own educational institution. Quality and relevance standards are defined and can be measured using the EDU-Q Card and 'Skills-Q Cards' (under construction).

title.narrative: Number of TVETs that deliver relevant and quality vocational education

description.narrative: Education providers are supported in taking a responsibility in quality and relevance ensurance of their own educational institution. Quality and relevance standards are defined and can be measured using the EDU-Q Card and 'Skills-Q Cards' (under construction).

title.narrative: Education providers supported and capacitated to establish relationships with relevant key stakeholders and to apply 7-steps to WORK

description.narrative: Education providers supported and capacitated to establish relationships with relevant key stakeholders and to apply 7-steps to WORK

title.narrative: Number of education providers supported

description.narrative: Education providers are supported in conducting a labour market analysis, identify most market relevant vocations and link with potential employers for internships or job placements. Support could consist of 7-steps to WORK training provided to TVET trainers.

title.narrative: Sustainable livelihoods and active citizenship through development of knowledge, skills and attitudes of marginalized children and youth

description.narrative: Sustainable livelihoods and active citizenship through development of knowledge, skills and attitudes of marginalized children and youth

title.narrative: % of all children reached that have a sustainable livelihood and demonstrate active citizenship

description.narrative: Edukans wants children to develop a sustainable livelihood and become active citizens. This is achieved through quality basic and secondary education. With the educational background children are empowered to successfully participate in society, both economically and socially. This indicator measures the percentage of all children reached by Edukans that have a sustainable livelihood and demonstrate active citizenship.

title.narrative: The extent to which all children and youth reached have a sustainable livelihood

description.narrative: Edukans wants marginalised youth to develop a sustainable livelihood and become active citizens. This is achieved through vocational (technical) training and in some cases Life skills training. The training helps youngsters to be professional in obtaining and keeping a job or start their own business and to successfully participate in society, both economically and socially. This indicator measures the percentage of all youth reached by Edukans that have a sustainable livelihood and demonstrate active citizenship.

title.narrative: Teachers apply proven and effective teaching methods and materials and use relevant curricula

description.narrative: Teachers apply proven and effective teaching methods and materials and use relevant curricula

title.narrative: Number of teachers applying newly acquired teaching methods effectively

description.narrative: Teachers are observed to use active learning and effective instruction methods in their lessons. In addition they are observed to apply specific teaching skills and appropriate methods for SEL and CSE and apply these skills in their classrooms. Also, they use the proposed curricula from Edukans.

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the number of teachers that completed one or more Edukans training(s) on Active Teaching & Learning, Comprehensive Sexuality Education, Social & Emotional Learning, Lifeskills and/or Gender Responsive Pedagogy

title.narrative: Young people have decent income through (self) employment

description.narrative: Young people have decent income through (self) employment

title.narrative: Number of young people with increased income through (self) employment

description.narrative: Edukans wants marginalised youth to get (self) employed in order to finally develop a sustainable livelihood. This is achieved through (technical) vocational training and Life skills training. The training helps youngsters to be professional in obtaining and keeping a job or start their own business

title.narrative: Youth complete training

description.narrative: Youth complete training

title.narrative: % of youth that completed vocational education

description.narrative: The percentage of youth that completed vocational education out of all youth that received vocational education in an Edukans project. This indicator is an indication for the quality of education. In addition, drop-out could be estimated using the completion rates.

title.narrative: Youth stating to be (self)employed 6 months after completing training

description.narrative: Youth stating to be (self)employed 6 months after completing training

title.narrative: Number of youth stating to be (self)employed 6 months after completing training

description.narrative: Through receiving market relevant skills, youth are able to find employment/start their own business

title.narrative: Youth stating to have taken up further education 6 months after completing training

title.narrative: Number of youth stating to have taken up further education 6 months after completing training

description.narrative: After receiving market relevant skills, youth are stimulated to take up further education

title.narrative: Youth trained in market relevant skills

description.narrative: Youth trained in market relevant skills

title.narrative: Number of TVETs involved

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the scope of Edukans' reach in the technical/vocational education field. All TVETs that are directly involved in projects of Edukans are measured by this number.

title.narrative: Number of youth trained

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the total number of youth directly trained through TVET programmes of Edukans and who completed the training or educational course (in order to get a general sense of the scope of Edukans' reach).
